resources.string: This is an application only for reference purpose. No legality associated.

This app provides you the total volume of available fuel from the dip reading for various size of fuel storage(10KL, 15KL, 20KL) installed at petrol station. It also gives you the fuel volume (varying from 700-759 kg/m3 for petrol, 800-859 kg/m3 for Diesel)at different temperature (varying from 0-50 degree celcius).
